description: Dutch nationwide TETRA network for all emergency services. Name C2000 refers to 'Communicatie 2000' - the nationwide emergency services communication system.
coverage: Nationwide Netherlands including water areas (North Sea coverage)
legal_warning: Dutch law permits receiving radio transmissions but prohibits acting upon or disclosing the information. Educational purposes only.

special_features.water_coverage: Extensive North Sea coverage for maritime operations
special_features.direct_mode: DMO (Direct Mode Operation) capability for disaster scenarios
special_features.gateway: Integration with cellular networks for wider reach

notes: Operational since 2004. One of the first nationwide TETRA emergency services networks in Europe.
